item.title: SumoMe, free tools to grow your website traffic.
item.description:
SumoMe, free tools to grow your website traffic.

Feb 29th, 2016 by Sarah Peterson A couple of weeks ago I smacked you over the head with 10,000 words of Facebook-traffic-generating goodness, showing you exactly how to drive massive numbers of visitors from Facebook (fo' free). I was practically vomiting knowledge rainbows. You're welcome.

item.title: Sales Calls for Developers
item.description:
Sales Calls for Developers

There are a few myths about sales that really stand in the way of developers and entrepreneurs from really being successful in the early stages of their company that I'm here to dismiss.

item.title: 7 Key Strategies That You Must Learn from Apple's Marketing
item.description:
7 Key Strategies That You Must Learn from Apple's Marketing

Have you ever looked at a really successful brand or person - a celebrity, say, or a big company - and wondered, "How on earth do they do it?" But Apple's success isn't just a matter of making a lot of money, or selling a lot of products.

item.title: The 3 Greatest Paid Marketing Hacks to Amplify Your Brand's Reach
item.description:
The 3 Greatest Paid Marketing Hacks to Amplify Your Brand's Reach

You spent thousands of dollars to build a shiny online business. You started to push out content at a consistent frequency because you had read that 79% of companies with a blog get a positive ROI for inbound marketing. But, the competition has turned fierce. Just look at the statistics below.

item.title: A Guide to Seed Fundraising
item.description:
A Guide to Seed Fundraising

Introduction The initial capital raised by a company is typically called "seed" capital. This brief guide is a summary of what startup founders need to know about raising the seed funds critical to getting their company off the ground. This is not intended to be a complete guide to fundraising.

item.title: Growth Geeks
item.description:
Growth Geeks

The Top 1% of Marketers The geekiest of geeks. The hackiest of hacks. The honeybadgers. Our vetting process is rigorous and only accepts the top 1% of Geeks. 41 Pre-packaged Gigs Hand-curated, industry-tested, marketer-approved, digital marketing services. From Social to Data, and Content to Sales - we have what you need.

item.title: How to Send Email Like a Startup

item.title: Developer Marketing Guide
item.description:
Developer Marketing Guide

Danielle Morrill joined Twilio in 2009 as Director of Marketing as the community grew from a few hundred developers to more than 100,000 members. She is currently the co-founder & CEO of Mattermark. During her Heavybit Speaker Series presentation, Morrill touts the advantages of simple yet effective marketing tools.

item.title: 95 Ways to find your first customers for customer development or your first sale
item.description:
95 Ways to find your first customers for customer development or your first sale

You can have the best idea in the world, but until you find someone besides yourself that wants it, it's not really a business. To find those people, as Paul Graham wrote in a recent essay, you have to "Do Things That Don't Scale." The problem is, it is often unclear what those "Things" are....
